verses.verse: Awake <WH5782> <WH8798>, awake <WH5782> <WH8798>; put on <WH3847> <WH8798> thy strength <WH5797>, O TZiyon <WH6726>; put on <WH3847> <WH8798> thy beautiful <WH8597> garments <WH899>, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>, the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>: for henceforth there shall no more <WH3254> <WH8686> come <WH935> <WH8799> into thee the uncircumcised <WH6189> and the unclean <WH2931>.

Shake <WH5287> <WH8690> thyself from the dust <WH6083>; arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, and sit down <WH3427> <WH8798>, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>: loose <WH6605> <WH8690> thyself from the bands <WH4147> of thy neck <WH6677>, O captive <WH7628> daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>.
For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Ye have sold <WH4376> <WH8738> yourselves for nought <WH2600>; and ye shall be redeemed <WH1350> <WH8735> without money <WH3701>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, My people <WH5971> went down <WH3381> <WH8804> aforetime <WH7223> into Egypt <WH4714> to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800> there; and the Ashurn <WH804> oppressed <WH6231> <WH8804> them without cause <WH657>.

Now therefore, what have I here, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that my people <WH5971> is taken away <WH3947> <WH8795> for nought <WH2600>? they that rule <WH4910> <WH8802> over them make them to howl <WH3213> <WH8686>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>; and my name <WH8034> continually <WH8548> every day <WH3117> is blasphemed <WH5006> <WH8711>.
Therefore my people <WH5971> shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> my name <WH8034>: therefore they shall know in that day <WH3117> that I am he that doth speak <WH1696> <WH8764>: behold, it is I.

How beautiful <WH4998> <WH8773> upon the mountains <WH2022> are the feet <WH7272> of him that bringeth good tidings <WH1319> <WH8764>, that publisheth <WH8085> <WH8688> peace <WH7965>; that bringeth good tidings <WH1319> <WH8764> of good <WH2896>, that publisheth <WH8085> <WH8688> salvation <WH3444>; that saith <WH559> <WH8802> unto TZiyon <WH6726>, Thy 'Elohim <WH430> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804> !

Thy watchmen <WH6822> <WH8802> shall lift up <WH5375> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963>; with the voice <WH6963> together <WH3162> shall they sing <WH7442> <WH8762>: for they shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> eye <WH5869> to eye <WH5869>, when the YY <WH3068> shall bring again <WH7725> <WH8800> TZiyon <WH6726>.

Break forth into joy <WH6476> <WH8798>, sing <WH7442> <WH8761> together <WH3162>, ye waste places <WH2723> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>: for the YY <WH3068> hath comforted <WH5162> <WH8765> his people <WH5971>, he hath redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804> Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

The YY <WH3068> hath made bare <WH2834> <WH8804> his holy <WH6944> arm <WH2220> in the eyes <WH5869> of all the nations <WH1471>; and all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> the salvation <WH3444> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.

Depart <WH5493> <WH8798> ye, depart <WH5493> <WH8798> ye, go ye out <WH3318> <WH8798> from thence, touch <WH5060> <WH8799> no unclean <WH2931> thing; go ye out <WH3318> <WH8798> of the midst <WH8432> of her; be ye clean <WH1305> <WH8734>, that bear <WH5375> <WH8802> the vessels <WH3627> of the YY <WH3068>.

For ye shall not go out <WH3318> <WH8799> with haste <WH2649>, nor go <WH3212> <WH8799> by flight <WH4499>: for the YY <WH3068> will go <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> you; and the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> will be your rereward <WH622> <WH8764>.
Behold, my servant <WH5650> shall deal prudently <WH7919> <WH8686>, he shall be exalted <WH7311> <WH8799> and extolled <WH5375> <WH8738>, and be very <WH3966> high <WH1361> <WH8804>.
As many <WH7227> were astonied <WH8074> <WH8804> at thee; his visage <WH4758> was so marred <WH4893> more than any man <WH376>, and his form <WH8389> more than the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>:

So shall he sprinkle <WH5137> <WH8686> many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>; the kings <WH4428> shall shut <WH7092> <WH8799> their mouths <WH6310> at him: for that which had not been told <WH5608> <WH8795> them shall they see <WH7200> <WH8804>; and that which they had not heard <WH8085> <WH8804> shall they consider <WH995> <WH8712>.
